towers

Class MagicTower

  • java.lang.Object
    • tilemap.Tile
      • towers.TowerBase
        • towers.MagicTower
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TowerInterface

    public class MagicTower
extends TowerBase
    This is one kind of tower named Magic Tower. The magic tower has its own image and type and other common attributes. This tower will be used in the later builds.
    Author:
    Yulong Song, Xunrong Xia, Hongrui Guan

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      static java.awt.Image magicTower

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MagicTower()
      This is the constructor with no parameter, assign the initial value of the attributes.
      MagicTower(int tileX, int tileY, int tileWidth, int tileHeight)
      This constructor can assign the value of tile's attributes besides the tower's common attributes.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
      To draw special effect on critter if it was attacked by magic tower.
      void fire(CritterBase critter)
      This function is used for decreasing critter's life depends on different strategies.
      void update() 
      void upgrade()
      When a tower be upgraded, its power, level and upgradeCose would be increased.

      • MagicTower

        public MagicTower(int tileX,
                  int tileY,
                  int tileWidth,
                  int tileHeight)
        This constructor can assign the value of tile's attributes besides the tower's common attributes.
        Parameters:
        tileX - The X coordinate of the tile
        tileY - The Y coordinate of the tile
        tileWidth - The width of the tile
        tileHeight - The height of the tile
